text: Max Edward Morath (October 1, 1926 - June 19, 2023) was an American ragtime pianist, composer, actor, and author. He was best known for his piano playing and is known as "Mr. Ragtime". Morath died in Duluth, Minnesota, on June 19, 2023, at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Max Morath papers at the University of Maryland libraries Category:1926 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from Colorado Category:Actors from Colorado Category:Musicians from Colorado Category:People from Colorado Springs, Colorado
title: Max Morath
